author: deweese
msg: 1) Commented out debugging println's from GaussianBlurRable
2) Reverted back to TYPE_INT_ARGB while this requires additional
conversions it solves a problem the AA clip path introduced.
I wish the JDK would get Alpha Premult right!

author: deweese
msg: 1) Removed ClipRable, and MaskRable both replaced with Clip & Mask
2) Reworked GraphicsNode so it tracks it's clip path via the 'Clip' filter.
This enables it to use anti-aliased clip when appropriate (and hard edge
3) Reworked all the bridges in accordance with #2.
4) Made Clip pay attention to render hints.

author: billh
msg: Activated text selection in svgviewer. Also some
cosmetic fixes for code-wrap and javadoc.
(turned on initialization of selector for text nodes.)
(fixed, for testing, but not used by svgviewer)
